title: Rooney Mara weaves monochrome magic as she steps out in her signature black and white look in LA
text:
She stepped out on a sunny Saturday afternoon in Los Angeles, in her signature monochrome look.

Rooney Mara, 34, looked chic in her simple white T-shirt and black, high waist jeans.

The beautiful brunette strolled along in black suede slides with a black leather bag slung over her shoulder.

Keeping it simple: Rooney Mara was spotted out in a white T-shirt and high-waist black jeans as she strolled in Los Angeles on Saturday

Rooney appeared to be on a solo outing as there was no sign of her fiance Joaquin Phoenix, 44.

The pair has been romantically linked since 2017, keeping their romance largely to themselves save for the occasional joint red carpet appearance.

However, they confirmed their engagement in July.

Her signature style: The 34-year-old actress looked chic in her easy-to-wear outfit

Joaquin's blockbuster movie Joker is riding high at the box office, holding on to the No. 2 slot.

It's an origins story for the DC Comics villain that's directed by Todd Phillips.

It had the most lucrative October weekend opening box office haul ever, pulling in $93.5 million.

When the film first screened at the Venice Film Festival, critics immediately raved about Phoenix's performance and tipped him for an Academy Award nomination.

With her man: Rooney flashed her toned tummy in a crop top and black skirt as she joined Joaquin at the Joker premiere at TCL Chinese Theatre in Hollywood on September 28

It got a similar response when it was screened shortly afterwards at the Toronto International Film Festival.

Earlier this month NME.com reported that Phoenix is interested in reprising the role in a sequel.

Speaking to Peter Travers for ABC's Popcorn, the actor said: 'I wouldn’t have thought of this as my dream role. But now, honestly, I can’t stop thinking about it.

'I talked to Todd a lot about what else we might be able to do, in general, just working together, but also specifically, if there’s something else we can do with Joker that might be interesting,' he added.
description: The actress, 34, looked chic in a simple white T-shirt  and black high-waist jeans when she was spotted out on a sunny Saturday afternoon in the city without fiance Joaquin Phoenix on Saturday.
